abstract.t: This document describes the "xml2rfc" version 3 vocabulary as implemented in xml2rfc tools at the time of publication. Editorial Note This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this draft takes place on the rswg@rfc-editor.org mailing list, which has its home pags at <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/rswg>. Source code and issues list for this draft can be found at <https://github.com/jrlevine/draft-rswg-xml2rfcv3-implemented>.
